lexUnit.name: gleam.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: shine brightly, especially with reflected light.

sentence.text: ` Was your action pure stupidity- " He saw Simon 's eyes gleam with hatred at him .
Coleby was leaning forward , his small blue eyes gleaming in his bland red face .
Once more he turned his head to look into her face , and his blue eyes gleamed with amusement .
` Do I ? " he said , his blue eyes gleaming with light mockery .
A string of multi-coloured lights gleamed beneath the overhanging thatch and bright yellow light was streaming from its tiny windows .
Even in this violet light his skin gleams coppery .
He could see the bridge now , its stones gleaming silver and the hart 's tongue ferns between them like shivering slivers of metal .
His great shoulders shook and his teeth gleamed white against a dark red beard .
The tree was gleaming green with new foliage that had broken out from the charred branches of the first encounter between the English and the islanders .
The stretched , polished skin over the lofty cheek-bones and the finely moulded forehead gleamed golden , the pits of the eyes were black but bright .
Just inside , where the old motor bike had been , there were fresh oil patches , purpley-blue splodges that gleamed wetly in the watery sunlight .
It was as though a white cloak had been thrown over the entire countryside , a cloak which gleamed beneath an enormous ghostly-white moon , robbing the night of its darkness .
The Russian 's teeth gleamed beneath his military moustache in a brief smile .
Her rich brown hair gleamed beneath the widow 's veil ; the bone structure of her face was overlaid with a suitable pallor , but no outward sign of grief .
Lines of humour fanned out from his mouth , and his teeth gleamed whitely in the darkness .

There it was , white skyscrapers gleaming in the sparkling dawn , the blue harbour waters dappled with gold , ships in that fragrant harbour between the Kowloon Peninsula and the gorse-dotted hills of the island .
Humour gleamed in the dark grey eyes as he understood her .
Her hair gleamed like a hastily polished brass pot , its tiny dents reddish brown .
His naked skin gleamed like gold in the morning sun .
She wore her hair low on the nape of her neck , its weight giving fragility to the long , slender throat , the chignon itself gleaming like spun silver .
Mama Sipcott 's butter sauce was gleaming on her chin and she looked very beautiful .
Her golden wedding band gleamed on the shelf .
She was very pretty , this girl , dressed in a bright green cheong sam , her dark hair gleaming with natural oil , and framing a pert , oriental face .
Her mind was locked into a vision of Nathan , his bronzed body gleaming with oil and sweat as he ran in silent relentless pursuit of his terrified prey .
The surfaces were bare ; the mahogany gleamed with fresh polish .
Full of sky , the landscape gleams with distant water .
Despite all , he was able to grin , his white teeth gleaming through the shaggy beard .
The same antique plates gleamed behind the glass doors of a walnut cabinet .
Lally gasped and coughed , she even spat , her teeth gleamed against the mud .

The dark eyes that swept over her were shadowed by heavily mascara-darkened lashes which contrasted with the white teeth gleaming from behind brilliantly red lips which were too thin for real beauty .
The furniture was a trifle heavy for her taste , but its wood gleamed brightly and the deep blue hues of the rugs were softly reassuring .
When she reappeared , her bald head gleaming dully , her arms were extended and she was making the mooing noise again .
The front door was painted a shiny black , and the brass knocker gleamed spotlessly .
